devdoc.author: Eduardo Moreno - Optimized Version
devdoc.details: Implements constant product formula x * y = k without any fees using structs for gas optimization

params.amountADesired: Amount of first token to add
params.amountAMin: Minimum amount of first token to add
params.amountBDesired: Amount of second token to add
params.amountBMin: Minimum amount of second token to add
params.deadline: Maximum timestamp until which the transaction is valid
params.to: Address that will receive the liquidity tokens

returns.amountA: The actual amount of first token added
returns.amountB: The actual amount of second token added
returns.liquidity: The amount of liquidity tokens minted

returns._0: amountOut Amount of output tokens to receive

returns.price: Price of tokenA in terms of tokenB

params.amountAMin: Minimum amount of first token to receive
params.amountBMin: Minimum amount of second token to receive
params.deadline: Maximum timestamp until which the transaction is valid
params.liquidity: Amount of liquidity tokens to burn
params.to: Address that will receive the tokens

returns.amountA: The amount of first token returned
returns.amountB: The amount of second token returned

swapExactTokensForTokens(uint256,uint256.details: Modified to match verifier interface (no return value)

params.amountIn: Amount of input tokens to swap
params.amountOutMin: Minimum amount of output tokens to receive
params.deadline: Maximum timestamp until which the transaction is valid
params.to: Address that will receive the output tokens

liquidityBalances.details: Maps pair hash => user => liquidity balance

pairs.details: Uses keccak256(abi.encodePacked(tokenA, tokenB)) as key for deterministic ordering

devdoc.title: SimpleSwap

LiquidityAction(address,address,uint256,.notice: Emitted when liquidity is added or removed

addLiquidity(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Adds liquidity to a token pair pool

getAmountOut(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the output amount for a swap

getPrice(address,address).notice: Gets the current price of tokenA in terms of tokenB

getReserves(address,address).notice: Gets reserve amounts for a token pair

liquidityBalances(bytes32,address).notice: Stores liquidity token balances for each user in each pair

pairs(bytes32).notice: Maps token pair hash to pair data

removeLiquidity(address,address,uint256,.notice: Removes liquidity from a token pair pool

swapExactTokensForTokens(uint256,uint256.notice: Swaps exact amount of input tokens for output tokens - VERIFIER COMPATIBLE

userdoc.notice: An optimized automated market maker (AMM) for token swapping without fees
